resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Hi read the %s story with the Team Stories app! #StoryTelling http://fancyurl.com

Do you want to stay in touch? Having literary ambitions or do you just want to work on something with family, friends or collugues? Write stories together!

Getting started is easy. Sign up with your Twitter account or just with your mobile phone and you are good to go. Best of all: it is free!

Not convinced yet? Of course you can have a look first to see what is all about and sign up later!

Before you can continue with your contribution we need to know who you are and make sure that you are that say you are. That make sense, does it not?

Do not worry. Registration is as easy as clicking on one of the two buttons below. Sign up with your phone or use your Twitter account.

You are just a few clicks away from your first contribution!
